description: The encToday app is a must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all that eastern North Carolina has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with the official companion to the Jacksonville, NC Daily News, the New Bern, NC Sun Journal, and the Kinston, NC Free Press daily newspapers in eastern North Carolina.  Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted writers. Access local news stories plus sports, entertainment, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our App spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter.  The encToday app is an ad-supported application.
